questions.question: Choose the correct third conditional sentence about forgetting an important appointment.
options: If I forget the appointment, I would have missed the interview.
If I had forgotten the appointment, I would miss the interview.
If I had remembered the appointment, I wouldn't have missed the interview.
If I remembered the appointment, I would have not missed the interview.
questions.answer: If I had remembered the appointment, I wouldn't have missed the interview.

questions.question: Complete the sentence: 'If Sarah had left the house earlier, she _____ the beginning of the movie.'
Which third conditional sentence correctly talks about not studying for a final exam?
options: If he studied harder, he would have passed.
If he had studied harder, he would have passed the final.
If he studies harder, he would have passed.
If he would study harder, he had passed.
questions.answer: If he had studied harder, he would have passed the final.
